name: Lights Out (itch) (Oswald33)
description:
Team: Jiabin Zhang, Yongfeng Ruan, Yuqing Xie, Zeduo Ouyang (Oswald)

This is a 2D platform game made with Unity as the emotion prompt assignment during my Games & Playable Media graduate program at UC Santa Cruz.

Our team were given the emotion Hope, and we were not allowed to use many words to express it. This time, we made a platform game, in which you can touch the ancient spirits to light up the world in the dark! Be brave, and bring hope to the world!
